title.narrative: Eye Health in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province

description.narrative: To contribute to sustainable provision and increased demand for eye care services at the district level for people in four districts of Pakistan.

participating-org.narrative: Pakistan Institute of Community Ophthalmology (PICO) Peshawar
